main_definition: Used to introduce an additional point or item that is not the main focus but still relevant.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In addition to something else; apart from it
meanings_and_examples.example: Besides my job, I also enjoy painting on weekends.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Without considering or taking into account the main point
meanings_and_examples.example: The weather is hot today. Besides that, we still need to finish our work.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to indicate an exception or special case not covered by a previous statement
meanings_and_examples.example: All cars are required to have insurance. However, police vehicles and ambulances are excepted from this rule.
